717952f-a.text:
Ave., C, west side, north from but not including East 3rd, to and including 5th Streets. Shown at the S.W. corner of 4th Street, is the Holy Cross House (No. 51); adjoining same is Holy Cross Protestant Episcopal Church (No. 43). Today (1937) these buildings are vacated and for sale.
April 26, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.

710860f-a.text:
East 3rd Street, north side, west from, but not including Ave. C. Note the spire of the Most Holy Redeemer Catholic Church, at Nos. 161-165 East 3rd Street.
March 24, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
